description:
The Advanced Docking System for Windows

Wikipedia defines a dock as a user interface feature of a number of operating
systems that typically provides a user with a way of launching and switching
between applications.

The Winstep Nexus Dock is a FREE* professional dock for Windows. With Nexus,
your most frequently used applications are only a mouse click away - and Nexus
turns working with your computer into a fun and exciting experience.

Nexus Ultimate is an enhanced version of the free-to-use Nexus dock which is
available stand-alone or as a component of Winstep Xtreme (a single
easy-to-install package featuring all of Winstep's popular desktop enhancement
products for Windows).
